com.mesosphere.sdk.debug

Class PlansTracker

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mesosphere.sdk.debug.PlansTracker
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DebugEndpoint

    public class PlansTracker
extends java.lang.Object
implements DebugEndpoint
    PlansTracker is the backend of the PlansDebugEndpoint. It aggregates the status across all Plans and allows for filtered responses. The PlansTracker also returns the currently active plans and the current state the the scheduler is in.
